name: Magic Tutoring
_source: speak;Max;If that's how you ask...|I ought to teach you manners before magic!
speak;Dark;Look, I just... need to learn better.
speak;Max;Alright... I'll help you out, kid.
speak;Dark;Kid? Kid?!|Maybe it's YOU who needs etiquette classes!
speak;Max;Well, if you can channel that level of conviction...|Give it your best shot!
speak;Max;Channel that emotion, fire at me!
speak;Max;Do it, kid!|Kid, kid, kid, kid-
speak;Max;Hyeowch! Yup! Seems alright to me!|Just remember to give it all you have, yeah?
speak;Dark;Yeah, I will!|Smell ya later, teach!
speak;Max;Hopefully that didn't singe my eyebrows off...
